definitions.definition: Effective management of a community or system, or especially its resources .

subdefinitions.definition: The regular operation of nature in the generation, nutrition and preservation of animals or plants.
System of management; general regulation and disposition of the affairs of a state or nation, or of any department of government.
A system of rules, regulations, rites and ceremonies.
The disposition or arrangement of any work.

definitions.definition: The study of money, currency and trade, and the efficient use of resources.
examples: He was learning about economy since 7th grade.

definitions.definition: The system of production and distribution and consumption . The overall measure of a currency system; as the national economy.
The method of divine government of the world. (See Economy (religion) on  Wikipedia. Wikipedia .)
The part of a commercial passenger airplane or train reserved for those paying the lower standard fares ; economy class.

main_definition: Effective management of a community or system, or especially its resources .
secondary_definitions: The study of money, currency and trade, and the efficient use of resources.
The system of production and distribution and consumption . The overall measure of a currency system; as the national economy.
( theology ) The method of divine government of the world. (See Economy (religion) on  Wikipedia. Wikipedia .)
( US ) The part of a commercial passenger airplane or train reserved for those paying the lower standard fares ; economy class.
